scenes.description: 'I appreciate your dedication, but maybe you should seriously consider taking a break. This isn't your responsibility alone.' She leans back, crossing her arms.

options.text: You make a good point. I need to set some boundaries.

options.text: I understand, Monica, but I feel it's important to see this through.
options.analysis: You show high empathy and social skill by acknowledging Monica's concern but staying involved, which might impact your self-regulation.

options.text: Thanks, Monica. I'll help out a bit longer, but let's outline what needs to be done.
